org.trimou

Interface Mustache

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Identified
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Template

    public interface Mustache
extends Identified
    A compiled mustache template. Implementation must be thread-safe.
    Author:
    Martin Kouba

      • Methods inherited from interface org.trimou.engine.id.Identified

        getGeneratedId

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        A name is used to locate the template contents by means of TemplateLocator. It's sometimes referenced as an identifier provided by the user. In most cases, the name represents a full (possibly virtual) path of the template.

        Note that it's possible to have more than one template with the same name for a MustacheEngine instance, due to existence of MustacheEngine.compileMustache(String, String).

        Returns:
        the template name
        See Also:
        Identified.getGeneratedId()

      • render

        String render(Object data)
        Render the template.
        Parameters:
        data - Optional context object (ideally immutable), may be null
        Returns:
        the rendered template as string

      • render

        void render(Appendable appendable,
            Object data)
        Render the template.

        Watch out! Any appendable-specific operations (e.g. stream flushing and closing) are not performed automatically.

        Note that if an asynchronous helper is used the "append" operations may be delayed due to the use of an intermediate buffer.

        Parameters:
        appendable - The appendable to append the rendered template to
        data - Optional context object (ideally immutable), may be null
